name: MenuCheckboxItem
description:
A menu item that toggles a setting on or off.
Renders a `<div>` element.

label.description: Overrides the text label to use when the item is matched during keyboard text navigation.

defaultChecked.description:
Whether the checkbox item is initially ticked.

To render a controlled checkbox item, use the `checked` prop instead.

checked.description:
Whether the checkbox item is currently ticked.

To render an uncontrolled checkbox item, use the `defaultChecked` prop instead.

onCheckedChange.description: Event handler called when the checkbox item is ticked or unticked.
onCheckedChange.detailedType:
| ((
    checked: boolean,
    eventDetails: Menu.CheckboxItem.ChangeEventDetails,
  ) => void)
| undefined

onClick.description: The click handler for the menu item.
onClick.detailedType:
| ((
    event: BaseUIEvent<
      MouseEvent<HTMLDivElement, MouseEvent>
    >,
  ) => void)
| undefined

closeOnClick.description: Whether to close the menu when the item is clicked.

nativeButton.description:
Whether the component renders a native `<button>` element when replacing it
via the `render` prop.
Set to `false` if the rendered element is not a button (e.g. `<div>`).

className.description:
CSS class applied to the element, or a function that
returns a class based on the component’s state.

style.description:
Style applied to the element, or a function that
returns a style object based on the component’s state.

render.description:
Allows you to replace the component’s HTML element
with a different tag, or compose it with another component.

Accepts a `ReactElement` or a function that returns the element to render.

data-checked.description: Present when the menu checkbox item is checked.

data-unchecked.description: Present when the menu checkbox item is not checked.

data-highlighted.description: Present when the menu checkbox item is highlighted.

data-disabled.description: Present when the menu checkbox item is disabled.
